problem.markdown:
You can make a randomized MC question very easily! Use an exclamation mark to randomize, an @ sign to pin something in place, and x to mark the correct answer.
>>Which stooge is the best stooge? <<
(!) Moe ( ) Larry ( ) Shemp (@x) None of the above
[explanation] Everyone knows Curly is the best stooge. [explanation]
